data_formats: Widely used file formats (Spreadsheet, JSON, GeoJSON, SHP, GPX, KML, XML, TIFF, MP3, MP4, etc.)
digitaf_data_wp: WP4 - LL and a common AF toolbox
WP2 - Tools for practitioners and farm advisors
name: Background data for the AgroforesTreeAdvice tool for tree species/variety/rootstock selection for agroforestry
description: Set of csv files (starting with data_.....) with the description of tree species/variety/rootstock, one line per tree species, one column per characteristics. This is the basis of the AgroforesTreeAdvice tool (Decision Support System to help choose tree species/varieties/rootstocks for agroforestry systems the tool can be used here: https://agroforestreeadvice.sk8.inrae.fr/).
data_ownership: ILVO (DENTRO dataset), CIRAD (ShadeTreeAdvice - STA - dataset), RegenFarmer (SCSM dataset), VUKOZ/Mendel university (Czech dataset)
access_barrier: No, direct download/access through a web link
digitaf_data_used: The data is the underlying data of the AgroforesTreeAdvice tool developped within the project and outside.
feedback_data_info: The dataset is unfinished, it will grow as more tools are integrated
documentation_list: Oral at EURAF 2024 conference: AgroforesTreeAdvice: an advice aggregator for tree species selection for agroforestry systems, Marie Gosme, Kristoffer Ronn-Anderson, Birk Skyum, Clément Rigal, Raphael Paut, François Warlop, Sarah Carton, Paul Pardon, Jakub Houska, Jan Weger, Lubos Úradníček, Antonín Martiník, Michael den Herder, Rico Hubner, Ana Tomas, Sonja Kay, Cecile Antin, Evert Prins, Bert Reubens
